channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Weak point threatening integrity of surface dressing, 19th February
item.description:
The road was very effectively surface dressed some years ago, and the surfacing remains generally good. However, in a few places the surfacing is threatened by deterioration such as this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Collum End Rise, Leckhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dismantled kitchen, 19th February
item.description:
There's a load of cupboards, wood etc, been dumped in the end car park in Coppice Gate.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 76 Coppice Gate, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: River cleaning - DOLL and plastic waste, 18th February
item.description:
So much rubbish in the river. Further down from doll there is a huge bundle of cardboard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 135 Carter Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in Albany Road, 18th February
item.description:
Pothole in middle of street. Looks as if it has markings but no sign of repair as yet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 35 Albany Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Severely damaged road, 17th February
item.description:
Significant stretches of Leckhampton Road have late and dangerous pot holes and damaged surface from the junction with Old Bath Road to Charlton Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 177 Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole outside number 149 Ciren Rs, 17th February
item.description:
Deep and dangerous to cyclists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 151 Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shocking road surface - many areas, 17th February
item.description:
Shocking road surface - many areas. The badly broken surface extends all the way along priors road. It's dangerous as motorists swerve to avoid the areas. Major repairs are urgently needed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 246 Priors Road, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole just near speed bump, 17th February
item.description:
Hi, as per photos, please assess & mend. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dewerstone Lodge Thirlestaine Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip burnt Site, 16th February
item.description:
The location is the Cleeve Common Road Public Footpath entrance to the Old Quarry used by a number of walkers. The flytip is just beyond the concrete entrance and has been burnt leaving metal mainly parts some sharp which could injure dogs that are walked there. Please can this be cleared up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Beer cans - again, 15th February
item.description:
All over the grass outside Rowanfield school.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 39 Cornwall Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large dip / sinkhole returning, 15th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Carlton Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Sinkhole forming on large stretch, 15th February
item.description:
Sinkhole problem on section of road from around 38 Carlton street about 46. thus problem is getting worse, and proving significant bouncing to cars travelling on the road - so will likely continue to get worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Carlton Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: About 8 potholes and road tears, 15th February
item.description:
Road complement falling apart in this section of Carlton Street, by Priory Street junction. About 8 potholes that are deep, as various road repairs fail.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 Carlton Street, Cheltenham
